persName.roleName: 27th Earl of Crawford and 10th Earl of Balcarres

note.p: Birth: Dunecht House, Aberdeen, Scotland (10 October 1871)
Death: Haigh Hall, near Wigan, Lancashire (08 March 1940)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 405-407, plate, by W H Bragg
Notes: Known as Lord Balcarres until his succession to the earldom in 1913.
